sentences.sentence: Underground is the only English word that begins and ends with the letters "und."
sentences.translation: underground(地下的)是唯一一个以und开头又以und结尾的英语单词。

sentences.sentence: When a match occurs, the trigger Manager USES a trigger handler to format the notification and notify the correct user through the UND.
sentences.translation: 发生匹配时，Trigger Manager使用触发器处理程序格式化通知的内容并通过UND通知正确的用户。

sentences.sentence: The youngest billionaire prize this year goes to Albert von Thurn und Taxis of Germany, who is 25 and listed as having 2.1 billion dollars.
sentences.translation: 本年度最年轻的亿万富豪是来自德国的阿尔伯特•冯•托恩和塔克西斯。今年25岁的他以21亿美元的身价跻身该榜。
